intent_atoms.description: ParsePipeline must store default options and resolve them per context
ParsePipeline.Options includes abortOnStructuralError, maxCorruptionEvents, payloadValidationLevel settings with .strict/.tolerant presets
Contexts inherit pipeline defaults unless explicitly overridden
Runtime clients should pick strict or tolerant mode without extra configuration via ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment and DocumentSessionController
Tests cover strict/tolerant defaults and dependency injection

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline Options
functional_units.description: Configurable parsing options with strict/tolerant presets and default propagation to CLI and app entry points.

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline.Options Settings
functional_units.description: Settings include abortOnStructuralError, maxCorruptionEvents, payloadValidationLevel, and .strict/.tolerant presets.

functional_units.name: Context Default Inheritance
functional_units.description: Contexts inherit pipeline defaults unless explicitly overridden.

functional_units.name: Configuration Exposure Tests
functional_units.description: Tests covering strict/tolerant defaults and dependency injection for ParsePipeline configuration.

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment Configuration
functional_units.description: Wires strict defaults through ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment for runtime clients.

functional_units.name: DocumentSessionController Configuration
functional_units.description: Wires tolerant defaults through DocumentSessionController for runtime clients.
